short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live Speech and Commands Recognition using DictationBox. Click on DictationBox extension icon and start dictation, that simple.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U:
Features:
 - Supported 100+ languages and dialects
 - Simple dictation using DictationBox text area field
 - Auto-text commands  are configurable in extension options
 - Say "next field" to navigate to next [*] field, see auto-text command "order template" for example.
 - Say "go to sleep" \ "wake up" to switch microphone between standby and listening modes.

Latest changes:
v.1.1.11: fixed issue when auto-text commands were not recognized on startup
v.1.1.10: fixed issue when "next field" command wasn't tracking text
v.1.1.9: added "Rate Us" button
v.1.1.7: cosmetic changes, bug fixes
v.1.1.6: added panel options button, updated icon
v.1.1.4: improved microphone error handling and documentation
long.en_GB:
This extension will embed dictation in every website you visit, allowing you to perform simple dictation as you go.
Supported 100+ languages and dialects including Español, Français, Italiano, Russian, etc. To select dictation language simply go to extension options and pick the language you want to use.

If you feel that recognition accuracy is not good enough - consider upgrading your microphone to one of the following certified microphones:
1. Blue Yeti: https://amzn.to/2Bewxvr
2. Blue Snowball: https://amzn.to/2VOE8tO
3. USB Computer Microphone: https://amzn.to/32o87eD

v1.0.6: Fixed issue with text insert in DictationBox
